meanings.definition: To convert an area of land into a forest by planting trees.
meanings.sent1: The community decided to afforest the empty field to create a new forested area.
meanings.sent2: The environmentalists worked hard to afforest the barren land, bringing new life to the area.
meanings.sent3: It was a comical sight to see the squirrels trying to afforest the park with acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her efforts to afforest the backyard turned it into a lush paradise over time.
meanings.sent5: The children's project to afforest the school grounds was a great success, with trees flourishing everywhere.
